title: The Fabulous Girls' Book: Discover the Secret of Being Fabulous
description: Be fun. Be feisty. Be fabulous. From making your own tiara to performing the perfect pedicure, the tips and tricks in this book will help you stand out from the crowd. Every girl deserves to look and feel great.The Fabulous Girls' Book Including tips and tricks to help every girl be utterly fabulous in every way, this title contains tips on: how to look fabulous in five minutes flat; how to throw a fabulous theme party; how to tie a headscarf in five different styles; how to make a tropical bath treat; How to tie a sarong; how to make your own headed notepaper; and more.
author: Veena Bhairo-Smith
